DOC.brief_summary: This study complementary main study `` Brain Derived Neurotrophic Factor Serum Levels Evolution During Six Months After Alcohol Withdrawal `` NCT01491347 . The purpose study evaluate Bdnf gene - Val66Met polymorphism subject alcohol dependence accord alcohol consumption status 6 month withdrawal ( relapse abstinence ) , relation presence psychiatric co-morbidities .
